forgotPasswordDescription: No problem, please enter your email and you will be sent a link to reset password
createAccountDescription: In order to Build Your Team, we'll just need a few things from you first
resetPasswordDescription: Please enter your new password and verify
welcomeSlide1Desc: Awesome information available to help you move along and get the info you need when you need it.
welcomeSlide2Desc: Personalised to do lists at your fingertips to make sure you are well prepared for giving birth
welcomeSlide3Desc: Connect with your pear counsellor and build a support team around you to be able to go through.
welcomeSlide4Desc: Creating an account enables us to offer you a personalised experience tailored to your needs.
